COMMENT_TX: ej,fossr101,P,lucir901,Balls and strikes Ray Fosse ejected by HP umpire Ron Luciano
$Ray Fosse dropped the ball in the collision with Carl Taylor
Freddie Patek left with sprained left wrist
ej,rojac101,P,ricej901,Call at 2B (Pickoff attempt) Cookie Rojas ejected by 2B umpire John Rice
$Ken Wright struck out the side on 9 pitches
ej,weave801,M,umonf901,HBP call $Orioles manager Weaver ejected by HP umpire Umont for continuing to argue the HBP on Patek in seventh
1:08 rain delay before start of game
$Steve Hovley popped the ball behind the mound
ej,pinil001,P,phild901,Balls and strikes Lou Piniella ejected by HP umpire Dave Phillips
umpchange,5,umphome,hallb901 umpchange,5,ump1b,lucir901 umpchange,5,ump2b,(None) HP umpire Larry Napp left with unknown illness; Bill Haller moved from 1B to HP; Ron Luciano moved from 2B to 1B
$Fran Healy called for interference for running into Graig Nettles
Freddie Patek pulled groin when he hit 1B
Lou Piniella hurt ankle running into fence

ej,kirke102,P,barnl901,Fighting $Ed Kirkpatrick advanced to 3B on the single and tried to score when Lou Piniella was trapped between 1B and 2B; Kirkpatrick was tagged hard by pitcher Lloyd Allen; Kirkpatrick went back at Allen and a fight started; both benches cleared; Kirkpatrick ejected by HP umpire Larry Barnett
$Twins 3B coach Ralph Rowe hit on foot by foul liner, left game
Paul chaal hurt ankle sliding into 1B on pickoff attempt
$the ball got away from catcher Ed Herrmann
$Fran Healy tried to pick off Buddy Bradford but the ball rolled away; John Mayberry then threw wildly
ej,mckej801,M,evanj901,Balls and strikes Royals Manager Jack McKeon ejected by HP umpire Jim Evans while changing pitchers
Boog Powell aggravated right shoulder on slide at HP
Brooks Robinson left with slight sprain left ankle
ej,weave801,M,sprim901,Checked swing Orioles Manager Earl Weaver ejected by HP umpire Marty Springstead
George Hendrick hit on right hand; cracked bone above right wrist
Charlie Spikes sprained left knee running to 1B in 2nd
$Cookie Rojas stopped short of 2B, Freddie Patek beat throw home
$Rick Reichardt hit by the pitch while squaring to bunt; HP umpire Merle Anthony blocked out and strike 1 called by 1B umpire Marty Springstead; Royals played game under protest

ej,bevak001,P,chyln901,Fighting ej,nortb101,P,chyln901,Fighting $North and Rangers Bevacqua ejected by HP umpire Chylak for fighting after North faked a steal of HP and bumped into Bevacquaas he returned to 3rd; they traded punches and both benches emptied; 15 minute delay
Joe Hoerner reinjured his left thumb
Mike Epstein fouled ball off foot
27 minute rain delay; continued through game
